bibl.title: Eine Randerscheinung des Papyrusbriefes: der versiculus transversus. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: Over 200 papyrus letters of the 2nd to 4th centuries AD have 1-2 lines written in their left margin. This creates a new possibility for dating papyri.
bibl.seg: Homann Margit, Eine Randerscheinung des Papyrusbriefes: der versiculus transversus. Avec résumé en anglais.
Over 200 papyrus letters of the 2nd to 4th centuries AD have 1-2 lines written in their left margin. This creates a new possibility for dating papyri.
